ability: RerollOnce: Once per round, after you roll a dice for an attack, you may reroll 1 attack or power die. You must keep the new result.
heroicFeat: DoubleAttack: Perform an attack. This attack affects 2 different monsters in your line of sight. 1 attack roll is made but each monster rolls defense dice separately. Both monsters are considered targets of your attack.

ability: DamageMinusOne: Each monster within 3 spaces of you receives -1 damage on all attack rolls (to a minimum of 1).
heroicFeat: MagicAttackAll: Perform an attack with a Magic weapon. This attack ignores range and targets each figure adjacent to you. 1 attack roll is made but each figure rolls defense dice separately.

ability: SurgeRecoverOne: Each hero within 3 spaces of you (including yourself) gains "Surge: Recover 1 Heart" on all attack rolls.
heroicFeat: HealAll: Roll 2 red power dice. Each hero within 3 spaces of you (including yourself) may recover Heart equal to the Heart rolled.

ability: StunAdjacentMonsters: When a minion monster begins its activation adjacent to you, it is Stunned.
heroicFeat: StunMonsters: Choose a monster within 3 spaces of you. Each monster in that monster group is Stunned.

ability: HealFatigueOnStill: If you have not moved during this turn, you recover 2 Fatigue at the end of your turn.
heroicFeat: FreeMoveFriend: Use during your turn to choose a hero within 3 spaces of you. You and that hero may each immediately perform a move action. This is in addition to the 2 actions each hero receives on his turn.

ability: HealCondition: Each time you perform a rest action, you may immediately discard 1 Condition card from yourself.
heroicFeat: ExtraAttack: Use during your turn to perform 1 attack action. This is in addition to your 2 actions on your turn.

ability: CopyAllyDefense: If you are attacked while adjacent to at least one other hero, you may choose an adjacent hero and add the defense pool of that hero to your own.
heroicFeat: Vanish: Remove your figure from the map and place a hero token in your space. At the start of your next turn, place your figure in any empty space within 4 spaces of your hero token.

ability: DamageIntoFatigue: When you suffer any amount of damage from an attack, you may choose to suffer some or all of that amount as Fatigue instead; you cannot suffer Fatigue in excess of your stamina.
heroicFeat: RunAttack: You may move double your Speed and perform an attack. This attack may be performed before, after, or during this movement.
